description:
My place is close to subway station, the beach, family-friendly activities, nightlife, public transport, shopping center, mall. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the kitchen, the coziness, and its location (close to almost everywhere). 30 min to Manhattan. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and small dogs&cats.

Important Rule: As this is an apartment complex, we ask for you to be respectful and considerate towards the neighbors, especially being too loud may jeopardize your stay (No parties/events, No loud music... etc)

I'll be available to offer help throughout your stay!

2 min walk to subway station
30 min to Manhattan w/subway
Nearby the Beach, Shopping mall, Restaurants, Pharmacy and Hospital!
Safe and Quiet area
Pet-Friendly

Street Parking
Nearby the subway station

High-Speed Wifi and Utilities included!
name: Bright Cozy Home in Brooklyn
review:
This place is just amazing. It is so close to the subway and shops.
Sezer is a great host.
His apartmet is afte5r reconstruction. Rooms are huge, in the apartmet everything is new. The bed is super comfortable. Me and my family stayed at his place for 18 days and I wish I can have the same apartment.
